attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app at all, i was very disappointed as soon as I opened the app. I couldn’t believe how inappropriate it was! It also is very hard to navigate and I thought I would get useful information out of this but I didn’t. if I could rate it less than 1 star I would.
attributes.title: Do not recommend

attributes.review: This app was so bad I could berly even get onto it. It sent me tons of ads and put viruses on my phone. It’s very sad because in the terms and conditions it says that there won’t be ads and it won’t ask you for personal information but it kept asking me for my address and social security number
attributes.title: Terrible & glitchy

attributes.review: This app took 40 hours to download which is unbelievable!! As soon as I opened the app it asked me for my credit card info? Since it’s out president trump I trust him and entered it. A few hours later I found out the app spent $300 dollars worth of stuff at Adam and Eve or whatever that dirty store is called. This app is unbelievable!! I just want to support our president 😠
attributes.title: Worst

attributes.review: This app is so bad! It killed my battery life and takes up to much storage and my IPad was heating up 🤮🤮🤮plus it’s not even useful DON’T DOWNLOAD IT! It’s not worth risking your IPhone IPad MacBook and other more! And there asking about your info! Don’t get it! If you download it. Delete it! But you don’t care then good luck bro! With a bad IPhone or a bad mac or IPad please remove it!
attributes.title: Trump 2020 app

attributes.review: Okay, so first off it took so long to download, and then when I finally got into the app it was so cluttered and hard to work with. After that, I started getting creepy emails and texts. Please don’t get this app, it will ruin your phone, mine is glitching out and has been since I downloaded this app.
attributes.title: Please save your phone!!

attributes.review: this app is truly horrible. at first, i thought i would have a better insight into what donald trump would be doing for his presidency. but it took wayyy too much space on my phone, causing most of my photos of my precious family members to be deleted without my confirmation, most of whom are deceased. i contacted the developers of this app and they told me i should die with them!! cannot believe this would ever happen. to top off the worst experience in my life, i think i now have chlamydia. thanks. how am i going to tell my husband of 39 years? donald trump, you have ruined my life.
attributes.title: just an embarrassment

attributes.review: This is like the worst app the Apple store has ever had 🤢 it taken almost all of my Storage on my phone and it taken like a million years to download and for nothing too because everything on the app was irrelevant and stuff that even a 1 year old will know so basically what I’m saying is this app is trash☺️✌🏼👑👑💓💓💖💖✨✨💢
attributes.title: This app is trash🤢💢

attributes.review: thought i give this app a shot but when i logged in i was introduced with a cheeto man.🟠👨 an audio kept playing over again saying “trump 2020” with a screeching sound. the wax from ears fell out due to the horrendous noise.💛😋 i later put it back into my ears.🌚 i still decided to give it a chance but then the app somehow released a smell from my phone that smelled like a rotten orange🍊. words appeared on my phone that said “support trump or else this smell will be set out for you to smell again” i was shocked! then i deleted the app but the smell got released again which caused me to faint. 😼😼😼 so this app is a no❤️ for me❤️.
attributes.title: no❤️🙈

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about the annoying orange and his backstory but soon learned that it was a creation made by the cheese puff that runs our country to brainwash it’s users and transform them into cheese puff clones I deleted it immediately. This app is horrible and vile how is it still in the App Store it is stealing information and brainwashing the youth of America.
attributes.title: Not an Annoying Orange hotline

attributes.review: So at first I was gonna download this app  to see what trumps plans were for the election and then for like some reason my photos were keep on deleting and also my apps kept acting up and so I decided to delete this app and then i saw that my apps and photos were back and also this app is a scam and don’t ever get it again.
attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP😤
